## 사건 정보

**사건명**: Hing Q. Lum Debra Lum, Husband and Wife, Individually and on Behalf of All Persons Similarly Situated Gary Oriani v. Bank of America Citibank, N.A. Chase Manhattan Bank Morgan Guaranty Trust Co. First Union National Bank Wells Fargo Bank, N.A. Fleet Bank Pnc Bank N.A. The Bank of New York Key Bank Bank One U.S. Bank John Does, One Through 100 Hing Q. Lum, Debra Lum, and Gary S. Oriani

**법원**: Court of Appeals for the First Circuit
